description.0: A handy club made of fine steel. The most persuasive line of reasoning in any debater's arsenal.

0.0: After using an Elemental Skill, on hit, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to <cryo>60%</cryo> of ATK in a small AoE. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

1.0: After using an Elemental Skill, on hit, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to <cryo>75%</cryo> of ATK in a small AoE. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

2.0: After using an Elemental Skill, on hit, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to <cryo>90%</cryo> of ATK in a small AoE. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

3.0: After using an Elemental Skill, on hit, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to <cryo>105%</cryo> of ATK in a small AoE. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

4.0: After using an Elemental Skill, on hit, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to <cryo>120%</cryo> of ATK in a small AoE. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.
